title: On a par, not a pedestal: women in the corporation
creator_credit: Lisa Doty, Douglas Leiterman, Philip S. Hobel, Hobel-Leiterman Productions and Document Associates
brief_description: Features workshops which provide an opportunity for employees at all levels to meet and work towards changing stereotyped attitudes about women in the corporate world.
